author: Nintendo of America
description:
PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC is now available on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/pac-man-world-2-re-pac-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

The fan-favorite is finally here, remade from scratch with the original recipe. Explore a world of fun and reclaim the Golden Fruit to save Pac-Land. Adventure is back on the menu! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #World2RePAC  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode two of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action and some fun segments like Identify the Weapon and a section on how to improve your Salmon Run play.

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #2 livestream on Saturday, Sept. 27 at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/live/9IGQb_lhulI

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. 
nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Facebook: https://www.facebook.c
title: The Splatoon 3 North American League Show – Episode 2
